name: Quite Literally, Out of Your Control
name_original: Quite Literally, Out of Your Control
description:
Solo development project for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam by emperorvaseline
The theme of the game jam is Out of Control, and this is my interpretation of it

The cannon has a random amount of power for every fired shot, the goal is to hit the target with the cannonball
The game tallies the amount of cannonballs fired before getting a win and displays it upon winning


LMB to shoot once the last cannonball has been fired
